success.email_change: A Mail was sent to this address in order to confirm that you can safely use it for this account. Please go check it.
success.submit_photo: Your photo has been uploaded successfully.
success.signup: Your account was created successfully. An activation link was sent to your email adress. Please check it to start using your C2 account
success.InfoMessage_message: The integration request has been sent successfully
success.add_prod_success: The production has been added successfully

error.signup: An Error Occured While Creating Your Account
error.general: An Error Occured When Submitting Changes.
error.email-or-password: Email address or Password are incorrect
error.Ce champ doit être contenu des lettres e: This field must contain letters and at least 2 characters.
error.Le numero doit contenir seulement des ch: The number must contain only digits

email.used: This email address is already used for another C2 account.

error.block_account: This account has been blocked due to three successive failed attempts. A mail to activate this account again has been sent to your email address.
error.ErrorMessage_message: The Factory you wish to integrate does not exist, check the company number entered or the email address of the Factory.
error.NotFoundMessage_message: You are entitled to only one integration, but you already have one.
error.Sil vous plaît, mettez une adresse email: Please enter a valid email address.
error.Votre mot de passe doit contenir au moin: Your password must contain at least 1 number, 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter 1 special character (!~>°%;.§@#$%^&*)
error.Entrez à nouveau mot de passe la même va: Please re-enter password the same value.
error.Cet email ou Cet logo est déjà utilisé p: This email or This logo is already used for another authority.
error.production_already_exists: The production for this date already exists.
error.factory_exists: A factory with the same e-mail or with the same company number exists.
error.form_incomplete: Please fill out all the required fields.
error.alphanumeric: This field takes only numbers as values
error.existing_register_number_msg: This registration number is already used for another machine.

warning.same_email: This is your current mail address.
warning.second_attempt: This is your second failed attempt to log in to this account. If you fail to log in one more time, this account will be disabled. If you forgot your password, Click on the 'Forgot Password ?' link.

alertInfo.disabled_account: This account is disabled. There must be an activation link sent to your email address. Please check it in order to activate your account again.
